text: Michael Gordon was a British film editor and screenwriter.Fujiwara p.309 He also directed a couple of documentaries and the 1951 feature film Wherever She Goes. ==Selected filmography== * Sleeping Car (1933) * Me and Marlborough (1935) * The First Offence (1936) * Seven Sinners (1936) * His Lordship (1936) * King Solomon's Mines (1937) * Strange Boarders (1938) * Climbing High (1938) * The Sky's the Limit (1938) * Esther Waters (1948) * All Over the Town (1949) * Wherever She Goes (1951) * Malta Story (1953) * Simba (1955) * Safari (1956) * The Rising of the Moon (1957) * Night of the Demon (1957) == References == == Bibliography == * Chris Fujiwara. Jacques Tourneur: The Cinema of Nightfall. McFarland, 1998. == External links == * Category:1909 births Category:2008 deaths Category:British film editors Category:British film directors Category:Mass media people from Bradford Category:20th-century British screenwriters Category:Film people from Yorkshire
title: Michael Gordon (film editor)
